body:
Updated if you want to take a look.

I'm not sure how, but apparently changing the default `repl` to `''` broke tests.  https://github.com/pandas-dev/pandas/pull/20273/commits/7a0cf0c93ad4778c78a6c7a477f9309cc6e13403 reverted that to be how it was before. Will let the tests run on this before merging.
